attributes.action: Bring redundancy pays in line with age discrimination laws.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present statutory redundancy pay is not inline with recent age discrimination laws.

As you can see from the following official directgov site :-

http://www.dti.gov.uk/employment/employment-legislation/employment-guidance/page33157.html

For service under the age of 22 you are only entitled to 1/2 a weeks wage (a weeks wage is considered £310 or less). Therefore workers under the age of 22 are considered less valuable.
